title: Bug 26004Removing a Text field leaves behind crud
OB: Bug 26004Removing a Text field leaves behind crud An inline editor (a Text) appears.3. The old editor is removed and a new editor is created.However, the new editor is smaller than the original editor and there is aline of garbage drawn under it.The code responsible for this action isorg.eclipse.jdt.internal.debug.ui.JavaStepFilterPreferencePage.editFilter()
SR: Go to the step filter preference page under"WindowJavaDebugStep Filtering"2. Press alt+f to create a new filter. Press alt+f again.
